Package com.flipkart.dao

Class FlipFitGymOwnerDAO

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.dao.FlipFitGymOwnerDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
public class FlipFitGymOwnerDAO extends Object implements FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
The FlipFitGymOwnerDAO class provides the implementation of the data access layer responsible for performing database operations related to gym owners. It includes functionality for registering gym owners, adding/removing gym centers, managing gym slots, and viewing gym details.

This class interacts with the database using SQL queries defined in the FlipFitConstants class.
